data.prayer: There are 314,700 people living in the county of Barddhaman. Only about 3,462 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Barddhaman, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,462 believers in Barddhaman to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Barddhaman are far from Jesus.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,462 believers in Barddhaman.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Raju people. Make the Raju people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Barddhaman.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Barddhaman hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the county of Barddhaman, West Bengal, India has a population of 314,700.

We estimate Barddhaman has 3,462 people who might know Jesus, 3,818 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 307,420 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 3,462 believers in the county of Barddhaman to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
